H0.text: is aluminium a ferrous or non ferrous metal. Ferrous

H1.text: is aluminium a ferrous or non ferrous metal. Metallic

H2.text: is aluminium a ferrous or non ferrous metal. Corrosion-Resistant

H3.text: is aluminium a ferrous or non ferrous metal. non-ferrous

A4.text: non-ferrous metals are metals or alloys that do not contain iron (allotropes of iron, ferrite, and so on) in appreciable amounts

A5.text: important non-ferrous metals include aluminium, copper, lead, tin, titanium, and zinc
